name: epatv-job-portal
description: The EPATV Job Portal is a web-based platform designed for Escola Profissional Amar Terra Verde (EPATV) to connect ex-students (alumni) with job opportunities posted by companies. Built with Laravel, it serves as a backend (REST API & Web routes) with Blade templates and Tailwind CSS for the web user interface. It offers a robust backend with MySQL, role-based access control, and automated database notifications.
